description: A spectacular finish by two-goal Charlie Kelman sealed a hard-earned 3-2 win for play-off chasing Leyton Orient at battling Mansfield.
title: Mansfield Town 2-3 Leyton Orient
title_page: Mansfield Town 2-3 Leyton Orient: Match report - BBC Sport
maintext:
Mansfield have won just one of their last nine Football League games against Leyton Orient (D2 L6), winning 2-0 in January 2022.
Leyton Orient have won each of their last three league meetings with Mansfield Town; only from January 2004 to April 2006 have they enjoyed a longer winning run over the Stags in the Football League (5).
Mansfield have lost nine home league games this season, including six of their last eight (W1 D1); only in 1960-61 (10), 1990-91 (10), 2002-03 (12), 2007-08 (14), and 2013-14 (10) have they suffered 10+ home defeats in a Football League campaign.
